entry.title: Why build on Fantom?
entry.summary: Fastest confirmation times (sub 900ms finality)

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Myso v1 Live, Flare L1 Live, L2 airdrops, and More...
entry.summary: Myso v1 Live Zero-liquidation lending protocol Myso launches V1 on Ethereum, with the initial rETH/wETH pool live for lenders and borrowers. Myso also launched gated LP program and a referral program for users. Flare L1 Live L1 oracle network Flare launches its mainnet and the first token distribution. Flare has two core protocols

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Yearn Permissionless Vault Factory, Woo Tokenomics Revamp, ETH Staking Derivative Options, and More...
entry.summary: Yearn Premissionless Vault Factory Yearn launches Permissionless Vault Factory, allowing anyone to deploy an auto-compounding yVault for any Curve pool with an active liquidity gauge. Yearn charges a 10% fee on Factory-deployed vaults. Woo Tokenomics Revamp

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Dopex stETH SSOV, Leveraged Trading Aggregator on Arbitrum, and More...
entry.summary: Dopex stETH SSOV Dopex partners with Lido to launch the stETH SSOV (Single Staking Option Vault). Users can deposit wstETH into strikes providing liquidity into option pools to earn yield in premiums and rewards. Pangolin AVAX FTM Cross-chain Swap Avalanche-based DEX Pangolin enables cross-chain swaps for native AVAX and FTM between Avalanche and Fantom.

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - Mux V2 Live on Arbitrum, Mastercard Artist Accelerator on Polygon, Ethereum Shanghai Hardfork, and More...
entry.summary: Recap: Week of Jan. 2nd

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Avalanche NFTs on Shopify, Trader Joe Coming to BnB Chain, Uni V3 LP Strategies, and More...
entry.summary: Avalanche NFTs on Shopify Shopify merchants can now mint NFTs on Avalanche and list NFTs on their stores for sale, instead of directing visitors to OpenSea or Magic Eden. Trader Joe Coming to BnB Chain Avalanche-based trading platform Trader Joe will deploy its DEX and NFT marketplace to the BnB chain by the end of March.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Fantom Gas Monetization, Celsius Owns Account Assets, Own and Earn on Bluechip NFTs, and More...
entry.summary: Fantom Voted For Gas Monetization Fantom governance passed the gas monetization proposal, in which Fantom will reduce the burn rate from 20% to 5%, and redirect the 15% to incentivize usage/transactions of Fantom dApps. Celsius Owns Account Assets The Judge of the Celsius bankruptcy case ruled that the funds deposited to Earn Accounts, which amount to $4.2 billion, are the property of Celsius, not the investors.

entry.title: Oracle Evolution
entry.summary: Rich data sources are what evolved the internet. Static pages turned into dynamic data thanks to APIs (oracles). As APIs (oracles) evolved…

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Uniswap Router Vulnerability, Wyre to Shut Down, Leveraged Trading on Arbitrum, and More...
entry.summary: Uniswap Router Vulnerability Uniswap recently introduced Router, a new feature that unifies ERC20 and NFT swapping into a single swap router, however security firm Dedaun found a vulnerability in Router that could potentially cause reentrancy exploits and fund losses.

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - LlamaSwap Live, Sushi New Tokenomics, Convex cvxCRV Update, and More...
entry.summary: Recap: Week of Dec. 26th

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Insrt Live, Vader Shutting Down, On-Chain DCA, and More...
entry.summary: Insrt Live NFTfi yield protocol Insrt launches on Ethereum. The first deployed vault type is ShardVault, which allows users to take a directional bet that the price of a bluechip NFT collection goes up and farm yield passively. Vader Shutting Down Stablecoin protocol Vader announces the plan to shut down as the team found no notable breakthrough in the algorithmic stablecoin design that is capital efficient.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Mean Finance on Ethereum, Gamma Strategies on Arbitrum, Strategy for the Calm Market, and More...
entry.summary: Mean Finance Live on Ethereum Previously on Polygon and L2s, DCA protocol Mean Finance is now available on Ethereum, offering DCA tools with MEV-protected & gasless swaps. Gamma Strategies on Arbitrum Uniswap V3 liquidity management protocol Gamma Strategies launches on Arbitrum, supporting new pairs for Arbitrum-based assets.

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - Synthetix Perps V2, Visa Autopayments, NEAR Metamask Compatibility, and More...
entry.summary: Recap: Week of Dec. 19th

entry.title: Letter to Fantom Foundation team
entry.summary: A few days ago we shared a letter with Fantom Foundation team, as a distributed foundation it can sometimes be difficult to align everyone…

entry.title: Fantom in review
entry.summary: The signal-to-noise ratio in crypto is incredibly low. The noise frequency is incredibly high.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Synthetix Perps V2 Live, Waves USDN Resolution Plan, Delta-Neutral Strategies, and More...
entry.summary: Synthetix Perps V2 Live Synthetix launches perps v2 with frontends on Optimism. Perps V2 reduces perps fees by using an off-chain oracle system and minimizes risks for perps LPs with new risk management features. Waves USDN Resolution Plan Waves team released a resolution plan for its severely depegged stablecoin USDN, aiming to stabilize the peg with proposals including token backings, team donations, swap reactivation, incentives for reserve holders, and adaptive vesting for USDN holders.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Symbiosis V2, OpenOcean Swap Aggregator, IL-less DEX, and More...
entry.summary: Symbiosis V2 Cross-chain AMM Symbiosis launches V2, enabling a serving network (Boba BNB L2) and single-sided AMM pool, making it easier to support more chains and increasing pool efficiency. OpenOcean Cross-chain Swap OpenOcean launches 1-click cross-chain swap, supporting multiple chains with better swap rates and better UX by implementing Celer’s IM Framework.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - NEAR MetaMask Compatibility, Sturdy V1, Trading Perps on Solana, and More...
entry.summary: NEAR MetaMask Compatibility NEAR developer Proximity Labs releases NETH, a smart contract that allows users to directly interact with NEAR dApps using their Ethereum wallets, such as MetaMask. Sturdy V1 Live Lending protocol Sturdy releases a revamped UI for 1.0, including integrated information and historical yield graphs. Sturdy also expands into the ETH market and will allow users to deposit LSDs as collateral to borrow ETH.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Fluidity Live, Visa Autopayments, Trading Expirables on Arbitrum, and More...
entry.summary: Fluidity Live Fluidity, a protocol that rewards users for actually using their cryptos, is live on Ethereum. Users can wrap their tokens into fAssets and start earning rewards for transacting. The rewards are generated by user assets lent to money markets.

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - multiBTC Live, SBF Arrested, Ren to Shut Down 1.0, and More...
entry.summary: Product Launches 🚀 Multichain multiBTC Live Multichain launches multiBTC and a BTC bridge. Meanwhile, Curve launches a multiBTC/WBTC/sBTC pool and launched a proposal vote for adding liquidity incentives to the pool. Yearn veYFI Live Yearn launched the staking UI for veYFI. Previously, users can take part in governance using YFI, and going forward veYFI will be the only governance token on Yearn.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Magic Eden Supports Polygon, Phi Live on Polygon, DEX Aggregator with No Slippage, and More...
entry.summary: Magic Eden Supports Polygon NFT marketplace Magic Eden now supports buy/sell/mint Polygon NFTs. Phi Launches on Polygon Phi.xyz, a metaverse project built around ENS & wallet activities, launches Phi Land & Phi Quest on Polygon, allowing users to create lands and/or explore quests of projects.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Maple 2.0, MakerDAO to Fund RWA, Stable Farms on Optimism, and More...
entry.summary: Maple Released 2.0 Maple releases a new version that focuses on diversifying borrowers and improving risk management parameters. Maple recently experienced a borrower default. MakerDAO to Fund RWA MakerDAO passed the executive vote and will deploy four vaults to fund investments in real-world assets (RWA), originated by BlockTower and issued on-chain through
